antgame.core.brain.instruction

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • antgame.core.brain.instruction.Instruction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DropInstruction, FlipInstruction, MarkInstruction, MoveInstruction, PickUpInstruction, SenseInstruction, TurnInstruction, UnmarkInstruction

    public abstract class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an abstract instruction, i.e. an 'order' for an ant to do something. These instructions are specified by ant-brain files, and the instances of this class (or more specifically, the subclasses) are produced from parsing this file using BrainParser. Each instruction is identified by an integer, which is the line number in the file. Generally each instruction also includes a reference to either one or two other instructions, which the ant (holding a finite state machine) will transition to after the instruction is executed.
